author: MilanoBicocca-pix
body:
#### PR description:
- Updated some parameters needed for the DB logging (`jobName` and `saveLogsOnDB`)
- Fixed some parameters in response to comments from DQM team in #31965 

#### PR validation:
Tested privately using fake beamspot values.

#### Backporting:
I will provide a backport to 11_1_X to be used in the upcoming MWGR.
title: Update BeamSpot DQM client configurations
